Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Ensure that every disposable field(s) are disposed correctly.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("This type contains disposable field(s) that aren't disposed.")

Docs.summary: The rule inspects all fields for disposable types and, if System.IDisposable is implemented, check that the type Dispose method does indeed call Dispose on all the fields (that implements System.IDisposable).
